title: NosaEd91
author: NosaEd91
content: Can all crypto currency be mined if No why so

comments.author: hymperion
comments.body: wikipedia can ask uit's a trivial question.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: NosaEd91 on January 02, 2023, 03:38:56 AMCan all crypto currency be mined if No why soNo not all. Some are tokens residing on a mainnet chain and doesnt employ proof of work to justify mining. There are a lot that uses PoS which hinder mining activities and resort to staking instead. A lot of projects are shifting to this method even the top 2 project ethereum uses that.
